```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(learnr)
```


```{r math, exercise=TRUE}
1 + 2                      # addition
5 * 4                      # multiplication
10 / 3                     # division
6 ^ 2                      # exponentiation
sqrt(5)                    # square root
exp(1)                     # Euler's number
pi                         # 3.14159...
cos(pi)                    # cosine
log(exp(1))                # base e logarithm
log10(100)                 # base 10 logarithm
5 %% 2                     # modular division
round(1.5579, digits = 2)  # rounding

```
